__e: If I knew you would throw it away, I would have kept it.
Tell your father we're sorry for keeping it here so long.
I kept it because I knew you were the father, the other mother, whatever, because I... Because it was yours.

They didn't tell me I could take it off, so I kept it on.
Yes, my mother was so sure she was having a girl... that she picked the name early, and kept it.
I was saving them... so that we could wear them in death.
I was keeping them for George to show his kids.
And you kept them, even though you don't like me very much?
